column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////If you're a vegetarian looking for a tapas place that offers more than the same 5 basic dishes every time you go - Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba is the place to visit.  There menu has plenty of vegetarian options
column2: and they are always willing to make it vegetarian if you ask them to.  I have been going here for years and it's one of my favorite tapas places in the city.  The service can be slow if they are super packed
column3: but overall they are pretty good.  The ambience and decor are fun
column4: and the sangrias are always good.
